subproject.description: With the overall objective to support the implementation of the Alliance of Civilizations’ South Eastern Europe Regional Strategy on Intercultural Dialogue and Cooperation, specifically targeting youth and media, this project aims to (1) raise awareness of the UN Alliance of Civilizations in Montenegro and (2) further the ongoing efforts towards the AoC-related regional project proposal.
subproject.title: Promotion of UN Alliance of Ci

title: Promotion of UN Alliance of Civilizations  (AoC)
